title: Healthcare UI with Home navigation to Intake and Billing

requirements.summary: Create a Home page with a prominent navigation menu containing exactly two items: Intake and Billing, using client-side routing.
acceptanceCriteria: Home page loads successfully and shows a visible menu/navigation area.
Menu contains the items labeled exactly "Intake" and "Billing" (English text).
Clicking each menu item navigates to its respective page/route without a full page reload.

file_operations.description: Add the app shell and client-side router that renders the Home page at the root route and includes a top navigation with exactly two links labeled "Intake" and "Billing" using react-router navigation (no full reload). Compose (do not edit) shadcn-ui components where helpful (e.g., button/link styling). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Implement the Home page layout with a prominent navigation area and a main content section suitable for a healthcare landing view. Ensure the only top-level menu items are exactly "Intake" and "Billing". Compose (do not edit) shadcn-ui components for consistent UI building blocks. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Ensure the application renders the newly created App router/shell cleanly and that navigation works as an SPA (no changes that introduce authentication flows).

requirements.summary: Add an Intake page/route reachable from the Home menu with header and patient-intake placeholder content.
acceptanceCriteria: There is a navigable route/page titled "Intake".
The Intake page renders a header "Intake" and basic placeholder body text in English.
Users can navigate back to Home and then to Billing without errors.

file_operations.description: Create the Intake page view with a clear page header "Intake" and English placeholder content indicating this section is for patient intake. Compose (do not edit) shadcn-ui components for header/container styling consistency. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Register the Intake route and wire it to the navigation item labeled exactly "Intake" using client-side routing (no full page reload).

requirements.summary: Add a Billing page/route reachable from the Home menu with header and billing placeholder content.
acceptanceCriteria: There is a navigable route/page titled "Billing".
The Billing page renders a header "Billing" and basic placeholder body text in English.
Users can navigate between Intake and Billing using the menu/navigation.

file_operations.description: Create the Billing page view with a clear page header "Billing" and English placeholder content indicating this section is for billing. Compose (do not edit) shadcn-ui components for header/container styling consistency. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Register the Billing route and wire it to the navigation item labeled exactly "Billing" using client-side routing (no full page reload).

requirements.summary: Apply a consistent, healthcare-appropriate visual theme across Home, Intake, and Billing, avoiding a blue & purple primary palette.
acceptanceCriteria: All pages share consistent typography, spacing, and navigation styling.
The overall look feels like a healthcare application (clean, calm, professional).
Primary/secondary colors used are not a combination of blue and purple together as the main palette.

file_operations.description: Define global typography, spacing defaults, and a calm healthcare theme via CSS variables used by Tailwind/shadcn-ui (e.g., neutral backgrounds with green/teal accents), explicitly avoiding a blue+purple primary palette. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Align Home page structure and component styling to the shared theme (consistent spacing/typography/navigation presentation). Compose (do not edit) shadcn-ui components for consistent styling. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Align Intake page styling to the shared theme (consistent spacing/typography/layout). Compose (do not edit) shadcn-ui components for consistent styling. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Align Billing page styling to the shared theme (consistent spacing/typography/layout). Compose (do not edit) shadcn-ui components for consistent styling. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add required generated static images under frontend/public/assets/generated and render logo in navigation and hero image on Home without backend image fetching.
acceptanceCriteria: Images listed in imageRequirements.required exist at frontend/public/assets/generated with the exact filenames.
Home page renders the hero image/illustration from the generated assets.
The navigation area renders the logo image from the generated assets.
No backend endpoints are used to fetch these static images.

file_operations.description: Add the generated static asset file exactly as required: frontend/public/assets/generated/healthcare-logo.dim_256x256.png.
Add the generated static asset file exactly as required: frontend/public/assets/generated/healthcare-hero.dim_1600x900.png.

Render the generated logo image from frontend/public/assets/generated/healthcare-logo.dim_256x256.png within the top navigation area (static asset reference; do not fetch from backend). Compose (do not edit) shadcn-ui components for navigation container styling. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Render the generated hero image from frontend/public/assets/generated/healthcare-hero.dim_1600x900.png in the Home page hero section (static asset reference; do not fetch from backend). Compose (do not edit) shadcn-ui components for layout consistency. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
